description: Work due dates and deadlines as commonly expressed in conversation

final date for project completion.title: Project Deadline
final date for project completion.description: Date by which all project deliverables must be completed

last day to submit project deliverables.title: Project Submission
last day to submit project deliverables.description: Final day for submitting completed project work

cutoff date for project submission.title: Project Cutoff
cutoff date for project submission.description: Final acceptable date for project completion

target date for finishing project.title: Project Target
target date for finishing project.description: Desired completion date for project work

approaching project completion date.title: Upcoming Deadline
approaching project completion date.description: Project deadline that is coming up soon

last date for client deliverable.title: Delivery Deadline
last date for client deliverable.description: Final date for providing deliverables to client

date promised to deliver work.title: Promised Delivery
date promised to deliver work.description: Date committed to client for work completion

contractual date for delivery.title: Contractual Deadline
contractual date for delivery.description: Legally binding date for work completion

end of quarterly review period.title: Quarterly Review
end of quarterly review period.description: Deadline for quarterly performance or business evaluation

annual review submission deadline.title: Annual Review
annual review submission deadline.description: Deadline for yearly performance review documentation

performance review due date.title: Performance Review
performance review due date.description: Date for completing employee performance evaluation

deadline for peer reviews.title: Peer Review Deadline
deadline for peer reviews.description: Final date to submit peer evaluation feedback

final date for job application.title: Application Deadline
final date for job application.description: Last day to submit job application materials

grant proposal submission date.title: Grant Deadline
grant proposal submission date.description: Due date for submitting grant application

tax filing due date.title: Tax Deadline
tax filing due date.description: Required date for tax document submission

invoice payment due date.title: Payment Due
invoice payment due date.description: Date by which payment must be received

expense report submission deadline.title: Expense Deadline
expense report submission deadline.description: Final date to submit expense documentation

quarterly financial report due.title: Quarterly Filing
quarterly financial report due.description: Due date for quarterly financial statements

timesheet submission deadline.title: Timesheet Due
timesheet submission deadline.description: Date by which work hours must be reported

vacation request deadline.title: Vacation Request
vacation request deadline.description: Last day to submit time-off requests

benefits enrollment deadline.title: Benefits Enrollment
benefits enrollment deadline.description: Final date to select employee benefits options

certification renewal deadline.title: Certification Deadline
certification renewal deadline.description: Date by which professional certification must be renewed

publication submission deadline.title: Submission Deadline
publication submission deadline.description: Final date for submitting content for publication

conference paper deadline.title: Conference Deadline
conference paper deadline.description: Due date for academic conference submission

work needed by end of day.title: EOD
work needed by end of day.description: Task that must be completed by day's end

deadline extended by one week.title: Extended Deadline
deadline extended by one week.description: Task with deadline pushed to a later date

hard deadline with no extensions.title: Hard Deadline
hard deadline with no extensions.description: Absolutely final date with no possibility of extension

flexible completion date.title: Soft Deadline
flexible completion date.description: Target date that can be adjusted if needed

team submission deadline.title: Team Deadline
team submission deadline.description: Due date for work from an entire team

client-imposed deadline.title: Client Deadline
client-imposed deadline.description: Due date set by client requirements

regulatory compliance deadline.title: Regulatory Deadline
regulatory compliance deadline.description: Due date mandated by law or regulation

priority_scale.1: Very Low - Minimal consequences if missed
priority_scale.2: Low - Minor implications if not met
priority_scale.4: High - Significant consequences if not met
priority_scale.5: Very High - Critical, must not be missed
